industries.name: Одежда, обувь, аксессуары, текстиль  (продвижение, оптовая торговля)

experience.description:
•	Developed strategic plans, roadmap and detailed execution strategy.
•	Understood end user requirements to drive new product development.
•	Communicated with multidisciplinary teams & develop strong partnerships across functions.
•	Supported Direct Agile development teams including sprint definition, backlog prioritization, user stories, development and release of MVP in Jira and Aha.
•	Ensured the maintenance of an up-to-date documentation library in Confluence.

•	Worked closely with DevOps and all levels management teams to create IT and data visualization solutions in a consumer products firm with $80M in annual revenue.
•	Identified gaps in Workflow, and led build of features across engineering and design, which increased yearly revenue by $1.1M through increased engagement and communication
•	Performed cohort and BI analysis that identified an opportunity to reduce pricing by 5 for a segment of users to boost yearly revenue by $610 thousand.
•	Led a team of 2 full-time employees and 4 contractors, and formed strong relationships with stakeholders.
•	Built data visualizations using SQL and Tableau for product KPIs that reduced manual reporting work by 8 hours weekly.

industries.name: Системная интеграция,  автоматизации технологических и бизнес-процессов предприятия, ИТ-консалтинг

experience.description:
•	Facilitated UAT process with the Delivery Team using Agile Scrum Sprints for software development.
•	Communicated with teams to synthesize analysis into key features and develop actionable solutions.
•	Participated in workshops, stakeholder interviews, review meetings, SOW sign off.

•	 Developed and merged into organizational level sophisticated dashboards to monitor data quality for sales operations, finance, marketing and supply chain.
•	Researched and created recommendations for new business advancement using Power BI and Tableau.
•	Became the single point of contact of customer and other databases and their governance processes.

•	Recommended integrated business plan with multiple revenue streams, producing close to $640 thousand annually.
•	Used SQL Server to retrieve, test and deliver data for data discrepancy issues solutions with stakeholders.
•	 Consulted with the business segments to identify risk management models for new and existing products.
•	 Focused on building and maintaining knowledge on the data sources, the data quality and metadata.
